translation.en: Well, speaking of my one person,
translation.fr: Justement, en parlant de même personne,

translation.en: there he is.
Nick, this is Saira.
This is Vik's sister.
-Would you… -[Saira] No.
-You good? -[Audrey] She's good.
-I am Nick. Nice to meet you. -Saira.
Love your brother, by the way. -He's hysterical. -[Saira] Right.
translation.fr: J'adore votre frère, il est à mourir de rire.

translation.en: Oh boy.
Okay, if you're trying to seduce me, it's really not working.
translation.fr: Si tu essaies de me séduire, ça marche pas.

translation.en: Oh my God.
Hey, Nick. I was just thinking about your lovely wife.
translation.fr: Je pensais à votre charmante épouse.

translation.en: Oh, you again.
I see you've already met Francisco.
And I guess you're both acquainted with Vikram's harpy of a sister.
translation.fr: Vous avez rencontré la harpie qui sert de sœur à Vikram.

translation.en: -Did he say "herpe"? -Harpy.
Countess! How humiliating it must be for you to see Claudette
translation.fr: Comtesse ! Ce doit être humiliant de voir Claudette

translation.en: actually close a deal with the Maharajah.
translation.fr: parvenir à convoler avec le Maharaja.

translation.en: Ever wonder what you might have done wrong, dear?
translation.fr: Vous vous demandez où vous vous êtes plantée ?

translation.en: Ever wonder what it feels like to be tall enough to ride a rollercoaster?
translation.fr: Vous vous demandez ce que ça fait d'avoir la taille pour le grand huit ?

translation.en: That's Countess Sekou.
She's Vik's ex-fiancée, and she's Claudette's old university roommate.
translation.fr: l'ex-fiancée de Vik et l'ancienne coloc de Claudette à la fac.

translation.en: And they're still friends? She's quite rude, by the way.
translation.fr: Elles sont restées amies ? Elle est malpolie, au fait.

translation.en: Well, on top of all that, she's also Claudette's maid of honor.
translation.fr: En plus, c'est la demoiselle d'honneur de Claudette.

translation.en: -[Audrey] What? -Yeah.
[man over PA] Hope you watched the video because the dancing is about to begin!
translation.fr: J'espère que vous avez vu la vidéo, parce que la danse va commencer.

translation.en: -What dancing? -I'm gonna fake going to the bathroom.
translation.fr: - Quelle danse ? - Je vais me cacher aux WC.

translation.en: -I don't dance. You dance. -I didn't get a video. Did you?
translation.fr: - J'ai pas eu de vidéo. Et toi ? - Va danser.

translation.en: They brought one to the room. -I forgot to tell you. -Thanks.
translation.fr: - Si, mais j'ai oublié de te le dire. - Merci.

translation.en: [man over PA] Ladies and gentlemen, please help me welcome the bride!
translation.fr: Mesdames et messieurs, veuillez accueillir la future mariée !

translation.en: Come with us!
All right, come on!
-Come on, baby! -[screams]
[over PA] And now it's time!
The moment you've all been waiting for.
translation.fr: Le moment que vous attendez tous…

translation.en: The groom, Vikram Govindan!
This is crazy!
Brother!
Back! Get everybody back! Get everybody back!
[guard] Stay back!
Vik!
-[Nick] Okay, all right. -[Claudette shrieks]
[Claudette] Is he dead?
It's not him. It's not Vik.
Oh, thank God! It's only Mr. Lou.
-Who did this to you? -[Claudette] Where is Vik? Hey!
translation.fr: - Qui a fait ça ? - Où est Vik ?

translation.en: [Audrey] Who? What? Oh my gosh!
Where is Vik?
-Who did this to you? -Who was it? Do you remember?
translation.fr: - Qui vous a fait ça ? - Vous vous rappelez ?

translation.en: It was…
[Nick] Say it. Say it. Don't die. Don't die!
-[Audrey] Oh my gosh! -[Claudette] Where is Vik?
translation.fr: - C'est pas vrai ! - Où est Vik ?

translation.en: [guard 1] Clear! Clear! Come on!
-Come on! Come on! Come on! Go! -[guard 2] Clear!
-[Nick] This is a distraction. -[Audrey] From what?
translation.fr: C'est une diversion. - Pour quoi faire ? - Se barrer !

translation.en: From the escape!
-[Colonel] Are you serious? -[shutter clicks] What do you mean all communication systems are down?
translation.fr: Vous vous fichez de moi ? Comment ça, plus de communications ?

translation.en: Get them up and running!
We have a security officer compromised. We need medical attention immediately.
translation.fr: On a un officier blessé. Il a besoin de soins immédiats.

translation.en: [Vik] Help!
Yo, you hatin’ hard on me right now, son!
-Homeboy! -[Vik] Nick!
[Vik yelling] Nick!
This is some janky-ass shit!
translation.fr: C'est trop pas de la balle !

translation.en: [Colonel] Lock down the island
until the security cameras are back online.
translation.fr: jusqu'à ce que les caméras de surveillance repartent.

translation.en: All guests are to remain in their rooms.
translation.fr: Les invités restent dans leur chambre.

translation.en: Oh my God. We need to get ahead of this, or our shares will plummet.
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai ! Il faut tout faire pour que l'action s'effondre pas.

translation.en: My brother could be dead and the only thing you're concerned about are share prices?
translation.fr: Mon frère est peut-être mort et tu t'inquiètes pour nos actions ?

translation.en: How do you think our investors will react when news of this gets out,
translation.fr: Comment les investisseurs vont réagir quand ça se saura,

translation.en: you little Miss Minority Shareholder?
Giving all her money to save the whales and heal the planet
translation.fr: Tout ton fric sert à sauver les baleines, la planète

translation.en: and all that nonsense.
Colonel. Where is Vik?
Where is my husband?
[Colonel] We will find him. We will find him.
The Maharajah's been kidnapped.
-What? -[Countess] Oh my God!
-Where did they take him? -[Nick] He's alive.
translation.fr: - Ils l'emmènent où ? - Il est vivant.

translation.en: Somebody with a machine gun threw him on a boat, and they took off.
translation.fr: Un type avec une mitraillette l'a emmené en bateau.

translation.en: -How many kidnappers? -[Nick] One.
Which means his partner is still here on the island.
translation.fr: Donc son complice est encore sur l'île.

translation.en: Hold on. How do you know there were two?
translation.fr: Attendez. Qui dit qu'ils sont deux ?

translation.en: If the kidnapper had Vik and was taking him to the boat…
translation.fr: Le ravisseur emmenait Vik sur le bateau…

translation.en: Ah, someone else was leading the elephant into the tent.
translation.fr: Un autre faisait entrer l'éléphant sous la tente.

translation.en: -Thank you. -There are 400 people on this island. That's a lot of suspects.
translation.fr: Il y a 400 personnes sur l'île. Ça fait beaucoup de suspects.

translation.en: Let us narrow it down for you, okay, Colonel?
translation.fr: On va réduire la liste, alors.

translation.en: Claudette, how many people knew about the elephant being part of the ceremony?
translation.fr: Claudette, combien de gens étaient au courant pour l'éléphant ?

translation.en: Just the board.
Yeah, we had to sign off at the expense of transporting an elephant.
translation.fr: Pour approuver les frais du transport de l'éléphant.

translation.en: So that means all of you.
What are you implying?
I think it's very obvious what I'm implying.
translation.fr: Ce que j'insinue est très clair.

translation.en: -[Nick] Mm-hmm. -One of you is an accomplice to a murder.
translation.fr: L'un de vous est complice de meurtre.

translation.en: -That is ridiculous! -I'm not on the board!
translation.fr: - Ridicule ! - Je ne suis pas au CA.

translation.en: Is it? You all hated my brother!
translation.fr: Ah bon ? Vous détestiez tous mon frère.

translation.en: What? No, I… I love Vik.
[scoffs] Oh, please!
-You've never forgiven me. -For what?
-Breaking up your engagement. -Oh, get over yourself.
translation.fr: - La rupture de tes fiançailles. - Te la joue pas.

translation.en: It was an arranged marriage between our families.
translation.fr: C'était un mariage arrangé par nos familles.

translation.en: We amicably split in order to allow for your so-called "love marriage."
translation.fr: On a rompu d'un commun accord pour permettre votre "mariage d'amour".

translation.en: You didn't want this marriage to go through so you kidnapped him!
translation.fr: Tu es contre ce mariage et tu l'as fait enlever !

translation.en: You gold-digging--
translation.fr: - Sale petite coureuse de dot. - Arrêtez !

translation.en: -Ladies, stop it! -Calm down, everybody!
translation.fr: - Sale petite coureuse de dot. - Arrêtez ! Que tout le monde se calme.

translation.en: -We do this for a living. It's what we do. -[Nick] It's our thing.
-And this is not just another case. -No.
translation.fr: Et c'est pas que le boulot, là.

translation.en: -[Nick] This is personal. -[Audrey] Yeah, it's Vik.
-[Nick] He means a lot to us. -[Audrey] So we'll find out who did this.
translation.fr: - On tient à lui. - On va trouver les coupables.

translation.en: -[Nick] A hundred percent. -[Audrey] And find out why they did this.
And we're gonna get Vik back, okay?
We're gonna do this for the low, low price of $25 million.
translation.fr: Tout ça pour la modique somme de 25 millions de dollars.

translation.en: Twenty-five mil, honey. I swear to God.
[Nick] I would've settled for ten grand.
So insane.
What are you doing?
[Nick] I'm blocking the door so no one can get in.
translation.fr: À ton avis ? Je barricade la porte.

translation.en: [Audrey] Honey, you're gonna hurt your back.
translation.fr: Tu vas te faire mal au dos.

translation.en: You know what would hurt my back? A knife going through it.
translation.fr: Ce qui ferait mal, c'est un couteau planté dedans.

translation.en: The killer knows we're on to him. We're on the next-to-kill list. I guarantee it.
translation.fr: Le tueur sait qu'on le traque. On est les prochains, crois-moi.

translation.en: What happened to Vik? A guy that rich gets kidnapped for the money.
translation.fr: - Ils veulent quoi à Vik ? - Il est riche, ils veulent du fric.

translation.en: There's no profit in hurting him.
translation.fr: Ils lui feront pas de mal.

translation.en: Oh God. We're not gonna be invited anywhere ever again. Ever again.
translation.fr: On sera plus invités nulle part. Plus jamais.

translation.en: The cheese has a hold on me, honey. I can't stop.
translation.fr: Je suis ensorcelé par ce fromage.

translation.en: Are you just… Will you take a slice like a civilized person?
translation.fr: Tu le manges comme ça ? Coupe une tranche !

translation.en: I don't know where the knife is.
translation.fr: - Je sais pas où est le couteau. - J'en peux plus.

translation.en: -Oh Jesus! -[Nick] What? You got a headache?
translation.fr: - Je sais pas où est le couteau. - J'en peux plus. - T'as la migraine ? - Oui.

translation.en: -Yes! -[Nick] I'm sorry.
-How's your back? -My back's killing me.
translation.fr: - Ça va, ton dos ? - J'ai super mal.

translation.en: -I'll get Advil. -Please. Please.
translation.fr: - Je te donne un Advil. - Oui.

translation.en: -I'm gonna get more cheese in me. -Honey, do not eat all that cheese.
translation.fr: - Je reprends un peu de fromage. - Mange pas tout ça.

translation.en: That affects… You're terrible all night.
translation.fr: Sinon ce sera l'horreur cette nuit.

translation.en: -Absolutely. -Oh.
And I have pictures from the tent of a burned robe with bloodstains.
translation.fr: J'ai des photos d'une robe brûlée et tachée de sang.

translation.en: Someone was trying to get rid of the evidence, and I'm sure it was the elephant handler.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un a voulu effacer les preuves. Sûrement le cornac.

translation.en: Good detecting, sweetheart.
-I'm doing my best. Here. -[Nick] Okay. Thank you.
translation.fr: Je fais de mon mieux. Tiens.

translation.en: -[Audrey] One, two, three, four. -[Nick] Okay.
[Nick] I gotta move this stuff now?
What if that's the killer?
-Killers don't knock. -What if it's housekeeping?
translation.fr: - Il frapperait pas. - La femme de chambre ?

translation.en: We… We're good! We don't need any towels.
translation.fr: C'est bon, on n'a pas besoin de serviettes.

translation.en: No! No! We do need towels. Leave 'em out front, please!
translation.fr: Non, il nous en faut ! Laissez-les à la porte.

translation.en: We've been here ten minutes. You need more towels?
You use 30 towels after every shower.
I'm sorry. At least I shower.
All right, you got me there.
[Francisco] It's me, Francisco!
Wait, wait, wait. What if he's the killer?
The only thing he wants to murder is your hm-hm!
translation.fr: Le seul truc qu'il veut défoncer, c'est ta…

translation.en: -[Francisco] Hurry! There's no time! -[Nick] Be right there!
-[Audrey] We're hurrying! -[Nick] We know!
translation.fr: - On se dépêche ! - On a compris.

translation.en: So sorry.
-You. -[Nick] Mm-hmm.
Gorgeous.
[Nick] Jesus Christ. All right.
[Audrey] Put this back. You said hurry. What's… How can we help?
translation.fr: Alors, qu'est-ce qui urge ? En quoi on peut vous aider ?

translation.en: -I have information. -[Nick] Yes.
Everyone thinks Claudette is this gold digger,
translation.fr: Claudette serait une coureuse de dot,

translation.en: but what's not so well known is the fact that, as a precaution,
translation.fr: mais peu de gens savent que par précaution,

translation.en: the board made her sign a brutal prenup.
translation.fr: le CA lui a fait signer un contrat de mariage carabiné.

translation.en: So that means if Vik divorces her, she's left with nothin'.
translation.fr: Donc si Vik demande le divorce, elle a droit à rien.

translation.en: -I gotta move this shit again? -Wait. Wait. Who is it?
translation.fr: - Je dois encore tout enlever ? - Attends. Qui est-ce ?

translation.en: [Claudette] It's Claudette. You must hear what I have to say.
translation.fr: Claudette. J'ai quelque chose à vous dire.

translation.en: Okay, one second. Let's get you in the closet.
translation.fr: Une seconde ! Allez dans le placard.

translation.en: [Nick] Okay, be right there. I gotta get some cheese.
translation.fr: J'arrive, je prends un bout de fromage.

translation.en: -Okay. Just go in there. -[rock scraping floor]
No! Get off of… Jesus!
-Coming, Claudette! -Sorry! One second.
[Nick] Hurry!
[Claudette] They all think I'm marrying Vik just for the money, especially the Countess.
translation.fr: Ils croient que j'épouse Vik pour l'argent. Surtout la comtesse.

translation.en: She's been jealous of me ever since we met.
translation.fr: Elle a toujours été jalouse de moi.

translation.en: -Really? I can imagine why. -I can imagine.
translation.fr: - Je vois pas pourquoi. - Moi, si.

translation.en: But still, she was my best friend.
-Right. -[Nick] Sure.
-You know? -Yeah.
-We were so close. -[Audrey] Oh!
And I think I just miss her sometimes.
-Oh, sorry. -[Claudette sobbing]
-I just wanna know who kidnapped my Vik. -Mm-hmm.
translation.fr: Je veux juste savoir qui a enlevé mon Vik.

translation.en: They all have something to gain from this.
translation.fr: Ils ont tous à y gagner.

translation.en: -Terrible. -[Claudette] I can't trust any of them!
translation.fr: - C'est affreux. - Je dois me méfier d'eux.

translation.en: -[whispers] There's a gun. -A gun?
[Claudette] The Colonel, so bitter about his demotion.
translation.fr: Le colonel, aigri par sa rétrogradation.

translation.en: Saira, always starved for attention.
And Vik had just discovered Francisco's dark secret.
translation.fr: Et Vik venait de découvrir le lourd secret de Francisco.

translation.en: -[Audrey] What? -[Nick] He had a secret?
-Oh! -[Nick] Oh God.
-[Audrey] We don't need to do that. -[Nick] That's cool.
translation.fr: - C'est pas une bonne idée. - On se calme.

translation.en: Who is it?
It's Saira. Let me in.
Uh, okay. One second.
-I need to hide. The closet! -No, no, no!
translation.fr: Je me cache dans le placard.

translation.en: -[Nick] It's too dark. -Here. Come on.
translation.fr: - Il y fait trop noir. - Venez là.

translation.en: -[Nick] She has all her stuff. -One second, Saira!
translation.fr: - Il est plein à craquer. - Une seconde !

translation.en: [Nick] Coming! Be right there!
Okay, gotta get to you!
-So sorry. One second. -Moving around some stuff for fun!
translation.fr: - Désolés. Une seconde. - On pousse les meubles.

translation.en: -I know who you need to be looking at. -[Nick] Who?
translation.fr: - Je sais sur qui il faut enquêter. - Qui ?

translation.en: [Saira] I told Vik she was bad news the minute I met her.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours dit à Vik de se méfier d'elle.

translation.en: She's suspicious, narcissistic, manipulative,
and looks cheap as well in that red dress--
translation.fr: Elle fait vulgaire avec sa robe rouge.

translation.en: Excuse me! I'm so sorry to interrupt, but I feel like I'd be a rude hostess
translation.fr: Pardon de vous interrompre, mais ce serait très impoli

translation.en: if I didn't offer you a piece of this exquisite artisan cheese that's…
translation.fr: de ne pas vous proposer un morceau de ce fromage…

translation.en: Nick, where's this… Where's that cheese? The big--
-The cheese is gone. -Where is it?
I put it, uh, in my stomach.
You ate that entire block of cheese?
Trying to shame me. I don't know if that's gonna get the cheese back--
translation.fr: C'est pas en me culpabilisant que tu feras revenir le fromage.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't mean to be selfish--
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas paraître égoïste…

translation.en: Sorry. Hold on. You know what?
Let me give you a drink right now just to relax you a little bit.
translation.fr: Je vais vous servir un verre pour vous détendre un peu.

translation.en: -Here. -I… I don't want that.
-No? Okay. -I'm okay.
-Oh shit. -[Saira] Who is it?
-[Audrey] Not sure. -You expecting someone?
It's like an after-party. People just show up.
translation.fr: C'est comme une after, pas d'invite.

translation.en: Let's put you into the bedroom, just in case, 'cause I don't know.
translation.fr: Allez dans la chambre au cas où, on sait jamais.

translation.en: -I'll hide there. -Don't hide in there! Why? That's an obvious spot.
translation.fr: - Là-dedans. - Pas là ! Quelle idée ! Trop évident.

translation.en: -[Audrey] Is it hot in here? -I'm hot too.
-I'm coming! -[knocking continues]
What if that is the killer?
Don't you kinda want it to be the killer so they can kill us?
translation.fr: Tu voudrais pas que ce soit lui, pour qu'il nous tue ?

translation.en: I am sick of this shit.
-Baby, I do not feel very good. -[rock scraping]
translation.fr: Chéri, je me sens pas très bien.

translation.en: What's doin'? Yeah?
Hey, great to see you.
What's going on? [chuckles lightly]
[Countess] I know who did it.
translation.fr: Je sais qui a fait le coup.

translation.en: Who?
It was Francisco.
He has had over 85 paternity suits filed against him.
translation.fr: Il a plus de 85 procès en reconnaissance de paternité.

translation.en: We suspect he's been siphoning money out of the company
translation.fr: On pense qu'il vole l'argent de la société

translation.en: in order to pay for all of these babies he made.
That's a lie!
Not the part about the babies.
Yes, that's true. I've spread my seed far and wide,
translation.fr: C'est vrai que j'ai semé mes graines un peu partout,

translation.en: but I have never stolen in my life.
translation.fr: mais je n'ai jamais rien volé de toute ma vie.

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -An excellent question.
translation.fr: - Tu fais quoi ici ? - Excellente question.

translation.en: -What are you all doing here? -Saira's here.
translation.fr: - Que faites-vous tous ici ? - Saira est là.

translation.en: -Nobody move! -Oh my God!
translation.fr: - Personne ne bouge ! - J'y crois pas.

translation.en: I ain't moving.
It's mine. It's mine.
-I missed it. -[Nick] Missed the call?
I have a message.
[distorted voice] We have the Maharajah.
If you contact the authorities, he dies.
translation.fr: Si vous contactez les autorités, il mourra.

translation.en: We'll make our demands known to you at 7:00 a.m.
translation.fr: Vous aurez nos revendications à 7 h du matin.

translation.en: That voice is hysterical. You got to admit it.
translation.fr: Cette voix est à mourir de rire, j'avoue.

translation.en: So we should all stay here. Correct, Colonel?
translation.fr: On devrait tous rester ici, non, colonel ?

translation.en: Because one of us is definitely working with the kidnapper.
translation.fr: L'un de nous est forcément complice du ravisseur.

translation.en: Yeah. Motives, opportunities.
Somebody here.
My head is spinning a little bit. Honey?
translation.fr: J'ai un peu la tête qui tourne. Chérie ?

translation.en: Babe, are you taking a nap? I'm tired, too, so let's, uh…
translation.fr: Tu fais la sieste ? Je suis crevé aussi, alors…

translation.en: Nobody leave here until we figure out who did what.
translation.fr: Personne ne sort tant qu'on sait pas qui a fait quoi.

translation.en: It's great to see everybody. -Thanks for coming over. Sorry, my bad. -[Francisco] Whoa!
translation.fr: Ça m'a fait plaisir, merci d'être venus.

translation.en: [yelps] Jesus! What?
Oh my God. Nick?
Nicky, honey. Get up. Get up! We got roofied.
translation.fr: Chéri, lève-toi. On nous a drogués.

translation.en: -What happened? -[Audrey] Baby. Oh my God! We fell asleep!
[Nick] We're sleeping now.
I don't know what happened. Uh, I…
translation.fr: Je sais pas ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: -Come on! Get up, Nick! -[Nick] Okay. Up. I'm up.
[Audrey] Who did this?
[Nick] What? Now they're just showing off.
translation.fr: Quoi ? C'est de la provoc, là.

translation.en: -[Audrey] Hurry up! -[Nick] Okay, I'm coming, honey. So…
-[Audrey] Get up! -[Nick] I'm up!
-Calm down before you say anything. -Nobody drugs us and gets away with it!
translation.fr: - Du calme. N'accuse pas… - On nous drogue pas impunément.

translation.en: -Maybe they didn't drug us. -It's illegal!
translation.fr: - Si c'est pas ça ? - C'est illégal.

translation.en: Maybe we just ate too much.
-That's why we passed out. -Nick. Audrey. Just in time.
translation.fr: On avait peut-être trop mangé. Nick, Audrey, pile à l'heure.

translation.en: -For what? -For what?
The real detectives have just arrived.
[Colonel] Connor Miller.
-[Audrey gasps] -Former MI6 hostage negotiator.
translation.fr: Ancien négociateur du MI6 pour les prises d'otages.

translation.en: Oh my God. Specializes in high-profile cases.
translation.fr: C'est le spécialiste des grosses affaires.

translation.en: He got the President of Uruguay's son back from the cartel.
translation.fr: Il a sauvé le fils du président uruguayen.

translation.en: -He wrote the book. He wrote the book. -On what?
translation.fr: - Il a écrit le livre. - Sur quoi ?

translation.en: How Rogaine doesn't work for everybody?
The book! Our course detective book!
[Miller] Greetings. I hear you need a case solved.
translation.fr: Je vous salue. Il y a une affaire à élucider.

translation.en: Colonel. Been a long time.
Francisco Perez.
Big fan.
Mr. Miller, we're also very big fans. Um, we can bring you up to speed.
translation.fr: On est très fans aussi. Voici les dernières infos.

translation.en: So what we know already is that this is at least a two-person job.
translation.fr: Ce qu'on sait déjà, c'est qu'ils sont au moins deux.

translation.en: I saw the first guy escape with Vik on a boat,
translation.fr: J'ai vu le premier type s'enfuir avec Vik en bateau,

translation.en: leaving the second guy still on the island.
translation.fr: donc le second est encore sur l'île.

translation.en: Also, just so you know, we were both drugged last night.
translation.fr: Et on a tous les deux été drogués hier soir.

translation.en: I don't know if we were drugged. We did have a few drinks--
translation.fr: C'est pas certain. On a bu quelques verres.

translation.en: -You must be the Spitzes. -Yes.
Yes, we are!
Your reputations precede you.
-There you go. -Why, thank you.
-That's nice to hear. -Uh, not in a positive way, I'm afraid.
translation.fr: - C'est sympa. - Pas en bien, hélas.

translation.en: I understand the last time you were involved in something like this,
translation.fr: Lors de votre dernière enquête de ce genre,

translation.en: everybody died?
Well, that was not the Maharajah.
How's he doing now?
-[laughs] Okay. -Right.
The Colonel's still here, most of him, so there. That's good.
translation.fr: Le colonel est encore là en grande partie, au moins.

translation.en: Um, listen. Mr. Miller, I read your book, and--
translation.fr: M. Miller, j'ai lu votre livre.

-[gasps] How? -[Audrey] Surprise! Audrey and Nick!

translation.fr: - M. Ronds de fumée, ça va ? - Vous avez eu notre carte de vœux ?

translation.en: I'm fine, and yes. The matching sweaters were a nice touch.
translation.fr: Ça va et oui. Les pulls assortis, j'ai bien aimé.

translation.en: -[laughs softly] -That was my idea.
So, hey, we need a little bit of help.
translation.fr: Bon, on a besoin d'un petit coup de main.

translation.en: -We need a lot of help. -[Nick] Yeah.
-You are under arrest. -[Nick] No!
I can never tell when you're being serious.
translation.fr: Je sais jamais si vous êtes sérieux !

translation.en: He looks serious. Are you serious?
translation.fr: Il en a l'air. Vous êtes sérieux ?

translation.en: For kidnapping the Maharajah, murdering his bodyguard,
translation.fr: Pour l'enlèvement du Maharaja, l'assassinat du garde du corps,

translation.en: stealing $70 million,
translation.fr: le vol de 70 millions de dollars,

translation.en: destroying many city blocks,
and, I'm assuming, sneaking into the opera.
translation.fr: Et vous avez dû entrer ici en douce.

translation.en: -We didn't do all of that. -We did number four and number six.
translation.fr: - On a pas fait tout ça. - On a fait le 4 et le 6.

translation.en: We're just… We're being framed.
[Nick] We got a hunch who really did it.
translation.fr: On a une idée de qui a fait ça.

translation.en: We need you to track this license plate for us.
translation.fr: On a une immatriculation à identifier.

translation.en: Nothing would give me greater pleasure,
translation.fr: Rien ne me ferait plus plaisir,

translation.en: but then I would have to immediately report such help to my superiors,
translation.fr: mais il faudrait que j'informe mes supérieurs que je vous aide,

translation.en: or I would be guilty of aiding and abetting.
How's this? We can tie you up,
and then you can say we forced you into helping us.
translation.fr: Vous direz qu'on vous a forcé à nous aider.

translation.en: Wait, wait. Who are you calling?
I'm not calling anyone.
I have an app to track the vehicle with that plate.
translation.fr: J'ai une appli qui localise un véhicule avec sa plaque.

translation.en: They have an app for that?
translation.fr: Il y a une appli pour ça ?

translation.en: God. You got Shazam on that after?
translation.fr: Dites donc ! Vous ouvrez Shazam, après ?

translation.en: I just… I wanna know what song this is.
[Nick] So the app says the truck is parked out by a château that's 80 kilometers away?
translation.fr: Donc le camion est garé devant un château à 80 km d'ici ?

translation.en: [Delacroix] Mm-hmm. Excuse me. Can you scratch my nose?
translation.fr: Pardon. Vous pouvez me gratter le nez ?

translation.en: Uh… Uh, softer. Softer. Hmm. [moaning]
-Thank you. -Also, do you have a car we can borrow?
translation.fr: - Merci. - On peut emprunter votre voiture ?

translation.en: -The keys are in my pants pocket. -[Audrey] Okay.
translation.fr: La clé est dans ma poche de pantalon.

translation.en: You talking to Audrey on that one too? I'll handle the pants pocket.
translation.fr: Vous vous adressez à Audrey ? Je m'occupe de la poche.

translation.en: What can I say? [chuckles] Shooters gotta shoot.
translation.fr: Que voulez-vous ? Je tente ma chance.

translation.en: Okay, is this a potato or a key 'cause I'm… Okay, got it.
translation.fr: C'est une patate ou une clé ? Je l'ai.

translation.en: -[Audrey] We'll take care of it. -Hey, hey.
Okay, no food in my car.
translation.fr: Pas de bouffe dans ma voiture.

translation.en: [Nick] Man, I bet Delacroix's got a sick-ass vehicle.
translation.fr: Je parie que Delacroix a une bagnole de folie.

translation.en: [Colonel] Excuse me.
The police are looking for you.
Yeah, no kidding. Colonel, we did not do this.
translation.fr: Sans blague ! Colonel, on est innocents.

translation.en: [Colonel] I know that,
but they have your fingerprints all over the murder weapon
translation.fr: Mais il y a vos empreintes sur l'arme du crime.

translation.en: and footage of you running out of the tent with it.
translation.fr: On vous voit avec en sortant de la tente.

translation.en: -[Nick] Yeah. -Typical Spitz vacation insanity.
translation.fr: Le grand n'importe quoi des Spitz en vacances.

translation.en: Miller's dead, by the way, and we lost the money.
translation.fr: Miller est mort et on a perdu le fric.

translation.en: It just looks like you took it.
It gets worse! The kidnappers just called. They've given us
translation.fr: Et il y a pire. Les ravisseurs ont appelé. S'ils n'ont pas l'argent à minuit,

translation.en: a midnight deadline to come up with the money,
translation.fr: S'ils n'ont pas l'argent à minuit,

translation.en: or they will kill the Maharajah.
Okay, Colonel, will you just stall for us until then?
-[Nick] Merci beaucoup! -[Audrey] Thank you, Colonel!
Oh my God!
Well, now you know why the kidnapper needs $70 million.
translation.fr: Le ravisseur a besoin des 70 millions

translation.en: For the heating bill.
Oh boy.
Okay, so that moat's, like, three meters?
translation.fr: Ces douves font quoi ? Trois mètres de large ?

translation.en: I think I can clear that.
Nick, three meters is, like, ten feet.
translation.fr: Trois mètres, ça fait dix pieds.

translation.en: I had the high school record for the long jump.
translation.fr: J'avais le record de saut en longueur au lycée.

translation.en: And I'm not kidding. I went further than that back in the day.
translation.fr: Je sautais même plus que ça, à l'époque.

translation.en: -Hmm. Did you? -Yeah.
What'd they call you back then? "Nicky Long Legs"?
translation.fr: On te surnommait comment ? Nicky le Sauteur ?

translation.en: You're mocking me?
[Audrey] You're not gonna make that jump.
translation.fr: Je te dis que tu peux pas sauter ça.

translation.en: It doesn't make me feel good to prove you wrong, but I'm gonna.
translation.fr: J'aime pas te contredire, mais il le faut.

translation.en: -All right? -[Audrey] Mm-hmm.
Okay, from that angle, it does look further than three meters.
translation.fr: Vu sous cet angle, ça fait plus de trois mètres.

translation.en: -Oh shoot. -What do you think?
translation.fr: - Zut alors. - Tu crois que tu y arriverais ?

translation.en: -Do you think maybe you could do it? -Now you want me to make that jump?
translation.fr: - Zut alors. - Tu crois que tu y arriverais ? Tu veux que je saute ?

translation.en: [both] Countess?
Surprised?
[both] Yeah. -Did you hear we just said… -[both] "Countess?"
translation.fr: Vous nous avez pas entendus dire : "Comtesse ?"

translation.en: Where's Vik?
I guess the kidnappers have him.
Kid… You're not the kidnappers?
I would never do such a thing. Vikram is my friend.
translation.fr: Je ne ferais jamais ça. Vikram est mon ami.

translation.en: [scoffs] Your friend.
You loved him.
[coughing] Oh God!
-I love money. -Hmm, hmm, hmm.
When I heard you two amateurs are gonna be handling so much of it, I just had to have it.
translation.fr: Puisqu'on en confiait autant à deux amateurs, je devais m'en emparer.

translation.en: "Had to have it." [giggles]
-So you didn't plant that knife? -Or deepfake that footage?
translation.fr: - Vous avez pas pris le couteau ? - Ni fait le deepfake ?

translation.en: Or slip something into our drinks that night at the villa?
translation.fr: Ni mis la drogue dans nos verres ?

translation.en: -Why bring that up? It's not relevant. -[Audrey] Of course that is relevant!
translation.fr: Pourquoi en parler ? Rien à voir. Bien sûr que si !

translation.en: -It's extremely relev-- -All right! All right! Jesus!
Two bad guys never works out.
-One always double-crosses the other. -[Audrey] It's a cliché of the genre.
translation.fr: - L'un finit par doubler l'autre. - C'est typique.

translation.en: -We've seen this before. Trust us. -So many times.
translation.fr: - On l'a vu. - Souvent. - Croyez-nous. - Sauvez-vous.

translation.en: -Save yourself. -Please.
Imani? Is the car ready for our getaway?
-Yes, Countess. -[Countess] Brilliant.
-No! -No! Don't!
-[Audrey] Oh my God. -I couldn't have been more clear.
translation.fr: - J'y crois pas. - Vous étiez prévenue.

translation.en: [Audrey] That is the cliché. -Yeah. -Right there.
With any luck, the smoke will get to you before the flames do.
translation.fr: Avec un peu de chance, vous serez asphyxiés avant de brûler.

translation.en: [Audrey] What?
Triple cross.
Oh my God. We are so getting blamed for both those assholes being dead.
translation.fr: On va nous mettre la mort de ces enfoirées sur le dos.

translation.en: [Nick] Let's go!
-We gotta hop out of here! -Okay!
-Come on! Let's go! Let's go! Together! -[Audrey yelps]
-Oh my God! -Go, go, go! Back, back, back!
To the window! To the window! Go, go! Back, back, back!
-[Audrey] Oh shit! -[groans]
-[Audrey] Jesus! -Are you okay?
-[Audrey] Are you okay? -[Nick] You gotta roll away.
translation.fr: - Ça va ? - Et toi ? En roulant !

translation.en: -[Audrey groans] -No! That way!
Oh my God, you're so big!
That's what you said on our honeymoon, but like then, we gotta keep trying.
translation.fr: Tu disais ça à notre nuit de noces et là aussi, faut persévérer !

translation.en: Oh my God, honey! I don't even know where we're rolling to, honey!
translation.fr: J'en peux plus ! Je sais même pas vers quoi on roule.

translation.en: -[Nick] I don't know! -[Audrey] Oh my God!
I was the one who roofied us.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui nous ai drogués.

translation.en: Wha-- What?
I mean, you did it, but it was because of me.
translation.fr: Enfin, c'est toi, mais à cause de moi.

translation.en: I keep my Ambien in the Advil bottle that you use, and I…
translation.fr: J'avais mis mes somnifères dans le tube d'Advil.

translation.en: I just get so stressed out. I'm sorry. It was all me.
translation.fr: J'étais trop stressé. Désolé, c'est ma faute.

translation.en: Don't apologize. I'm the one who needs to apologize.
translation.fr: T'excuse pas. C'est à moi de m'excuser.

translation.en: I have been criticizing you so much. I feel terrible.
translation.fr: Je te critique tout le temps, je m'en veux.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -No. It doesn't matter.
Your billboards and dental floss business cards--
-Dental floss business cards. -[Audrey] I know, and I didn't think…
translation.fr: - Mes cartes fil dentaire… - Je sais.

translation.en: -It's not that it was a bad idea-- -The razor thing on the card!
translation.fr: C'est pas si mal. La carte est coupante !

translation.en: I can use it to cut the tape! I got one in my pocket!
translation.fr: Ça coupera le scotch ! J'en ai une dans ma poche.

translation.en: -Where? -Right here in the back pocket.
translation.fr: - Où ça ? - Dans ma poche arrière.

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh! Hold on. Hold on! Hold on!
I'm trying to find it.
[Nick] Help me. Help me. Get it. Get it. Get it. Reach.
-Reach down. Down. Please, God. -[Audrey] Got it. I got it!
Are we good? Are we cutting this?
-Is it working? -I think it's working.
I love you, dental floss business cards. I love you so much. Oh, please, please, please.
translation.fr: Je t'aime, carte à fil dentaire. S'il te plaît !

translation.en: Get the feet.
-I got it! -[Nick] Come on! Come on! Go! Go!
-What are you doing? -[Nick] Oh God.
Here, take this. I'm gonna shoot out the window.
translation.fr: Prends ça. Je tire dans la fenêtre !

translation.en: God!
My God! It's a French gun!
[Audrey] Honey!
-No. -What?
Baby! Oh! I love you!
-What? -No!
Shit! Shit!
This time, I'm driving.
Are you kidding me? [laughs] I can't…
You're getting it again, hon.
-Sorry. -That's all right.
My name is Inspector Laurent Delacroix.
Fifteen minutes ago, Interpol assumed operational control of this matter
translation.fr: Depuis 15 minutes, Interpol a pris la direction des opérations

translation.en: and assigned me to head the task force.
translation.fr: et m'a chargé de diriger l'équipe.

translation.en: Okay, we get it, but why all of a sudden Interpol gets involved?
translation.fr: Très bien, mais pourquoi Interpol s'en mêle maintenant ?

translation.en: The heinous nature of the crimes.
translation.fr: Parce que ce sont des crimes de haine.

translation.en: Several murders, a kidnapping,
the destruction of the oldest café in Paris,
translation.fr: la destruction du plus vieux café de Paris.

translation.en: the tying up of a very handsome opera fan.
translation.fr: Le fait d'avoir ligoté un très bel homme amateur d'opéra.

translation.en: Oh dear God.
Okay, but why should we believe you'll be able to find Nick and Audrey Spitz?
translation.fr: Mais pourquoi devrait-on vous croire capable de retrouver les Spitz ?

translation.en: Because I have them on the phone.
translation.fr: Parce que je les ai au bout du fil.

translation.en: -[Audrey] Hello? Hey. Is everybody there? -Yes, Audrey.
translation.fr: - Tout le monde est là ? - Oui, Audrey.

translation.en: Everyone except--
The Countess and her creepy little friend?
translation.fr: La comtesse et sa copine malaisante ?

translation.en: Give back Vikram, you monsters!
-You already got the money. -Yes, we do have the money.
translation.fr: - Vous avez déjà l'argent. - Oui, on l'a.

translation.en: And if you ever wanna see it again, you better tell the kidnapper
translation.fr: Et si vous voulez le revoir, vous avez intérêt à dire au ravisseur

translation.en: to bring the Maharajah to the Jules Verne restaurant.
translation.fr: d'amener le Maharaja au restaurant Le Jules Verne.

translation.en: What? The what?
[Audrey] Jules Verne restaurant.
On the observation deck at the Eiffel Tower at midnight.
translation.fr: Au deuxième étage de la tour Eiffel à minuit.

translation.en: What do you mean? We don't have my brother.
translation.fr: On ne détient pas mon frère.

translation.en: -Bullshit! -Oh, somebody there does, okay?
translation.fr: - N'importe quoi ! - L'un de vous l'a enlevé.

translation.en: So do what my wife just said. Midnight, Maharajah, alive.
translation.fr: Faites ce que dit ma femme. À minuit, avec le Maharaja en vie.

translation.en: And, Inspector, we tried to start your car up
translation.fr: Inspecteur, on a essayé de faire démarrer votre voiture,

translation.en: but, uh, couldn't get it done, so we left it there.
translation.fr: Inspecteur, on a essayé de faire démarrer votre voiture, mais on a dû la laisser là-bas.

translation.en: What?
We stole a Lamborghini. You can have that
when we're done with it.
Oh my God. So gorgeous.
Why are you all dressed up?
We read online there was a dress code.
translation.fr: On a vu qu'il y avait un dress code.

translation.en: We couldn't get into Tavern on the Green 'cause I was wearing shorts one time.
translation.fr: Le Tavern on the Green nous a refusés, une fois.

translation.en: -Wh-- Where is everybody? -Yeah.
We bought out the restaurant so we wouldn't be disturbed.
translation.fr: On a réservé tout le resto pour être tranquilles.

translation.en: You do understand the idea of doing this in public
translation.fr: L'idée, c'était de faire ça en public

translation.en: is so there are actually people around?
translation.fr: pour qu'il y ait des témoins.

translation.en: -How did you even get these clothes? -And you got your hair done?
translation.fr: - D'où sortent ces vêtements ? - Vous vous êtes fait coiffer ?

translation.en: Look, we had a situation, all right?
translation.fr: On a eu un problème, d'accord ?

translation.en: There was a moat, and then we did… I don't have to explain myself, okay?
translation.fr: Il y avait des douves, on a dû… J'ai pas à expliquer.

translation.en: We'll be the ones who ask the questions. How's that?
translation.fr: C'est nous qui posons les questions.

translation.en: -Go ahead. Ask the questions. -Let's review the suspects, shall we?
translation.fr: - Vas-y. - Passons les suspects en revue.

translation.en: Get comfortable.
Let's start with Saira Govindan.
Me?
I defended you. I actually really liked you.
translation.fr: Je vous ai défendue. Je vous aimais bien, d'ailleurs.

translation.en: I know you did. We really liked you. You've been so nice to us.
translation.fr: Je sais, et on vous appréciait. Vous avez été très sympa.

translation.en: It's just kind of what we do.
Kidnap my own brother?
-She's getting upset. -I see. She's in front of me.
Are you out of your mind?
-Just move on. Audrey, move on. -Moving on.
[Nick] All good, Saira.
[Audrey] Francisco, chairman of the board.
With the Maharajah gone, you can embezzle all the money you want
translation.fr: Sans le Maharaja, vous pouvez siphonner l'argent nécessaire

translation.en: to cover all those paternity suits for your 2,000 children.
translation.fr: pour les procès en paternité de vos 2 000 enfants.

translation.en: I say we make it 2,001, huh?
Get out of my face. Disgusting pig.
Parisian shopgirl desperate for money.
translation.fr: Vendeuse parisienne prête à tout pour l'argent.

translation.en: If I wanted money, don't you think I'd just marry him?
translation.fr: Pour avoir son argent, j'ai qu'à l'épouser, non ?

translation.en: Not with that brutal prenup the board had you sign.
translation.fr: Pas avec le contrat de mariage que vous avez signé.

translation.en: But what about the Colonel? What's his motive?
translation.fr: Et le colonel, quel est son mobile ?

translation.en: Well, maybe he just is sick of working for rich people 'cause you guys suck.
translation.fr: Il en a peut-être marre de bosser pour des richards comme vous tous.

translation.en: Or maybe the Colonel needed enough money to afford himself
translation.fr: Ou peut-être que le colonel avait besoin d'argent pour se payer

translation.en: a bionic arm.
I looked into it. They're not very expensive.
translation.fr: Je me suis renseigné. Ce n'est pas si cher que ça.

translation.en: -How much are we talking? -Twenty, thirty K.
That's it? Jeez, maybe I should get something like that.
translation.fr: C'est tout ? Je devrais m'en offrir un.

translation.en: You're gonna have to lose an arm for that.
I wasn't talking about for the arm.
Okay, we went through everybody.
translation.fr: On les a passés en revue.

translation.en: Who did it?
Um, I've been asked to show you all this sick-ass bomb and shit.
translation.fr: On m'a demandé de vous montrer cette bombe de gros malades.

translation.en: Enough to blow this whole damn tower up, G.
translation.fr: Il y a de quoi faire sauter la tour.

translation.en: So check it. You gotta put the Benjamins in the lift and send it to the top floor.
translation.fr: Donc il faut mettre les biftons dans l'ascenseur et l'envoyer au 3e.

translation.en: Once the amount has been chickity-checked, they'll send down the, uh…
translation.fr: Une fois le montant vérifié, ils enverront le…

translation.en: God, what's it called? The button blaster thingy? The--
translation.fr: Comment s'appelle le truc qui fait péter la bombe ?

translation.en: -The remote detonator? -Yes, that shit.
They'll send that back down, and then we can be outtie.
translation.fr: Ils nous l'enverront et on pourra se casser.

translation.en: And it's a bit of a hurry or something because, you know…
translation.fr: Ça urge un peu, genre, parce que… Regardez.

translation.en: Nick, Nick, Nick. The money. You must put it in the elevator.
translation.fr: L'argent. Il faut le mettre dans l'ascenseur.

translation.en: -Now! -Nah.
-"Nah"? -What do you mean, "nah"?
-What are you doing? -I don't think they'll blow him up.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Ils le feront pas sauter.

translation.en: Nick, are you really just going on a hunch right now?
translation.fr: Tu mises sur ton instinct, sérieux ?

translation.en: -Trust me. -[Vik] Nick!
Bro-heem!
No, it's all good in the hood, Maharajah.
Whoever did this had some serious training, right?
translation.fr: Celui qui a fait ça n'est pas un débutant.

translation.en: 'Cause he killed Mr. Lou, a lethal badass.
translation.fr: Il a tué M. Lou, un gros dur qui assure.

translation.en: We're counting down here, G.
And we know the kidnapper had some major hacking skills
translation.fr: On sait que le ravisseur sait hacker un système,

translation.en: to access that footage and do the deepfake.
Come on, Nick!
He knew exactly where to find Mr. Lou and Vik backstage at the wedding
translation.fr: Il savait où trouver M. Lou et Vik avant leur entrée dans la tente,

translation.en: in order to pull off the elephant switcheroo.
-But, honey-- -Nick! I'm gonna blow up!
With all that expertise…
translation.fr: Le mec qui sait faire ça…

translation.en: …this guy should write a book.
[sighs] "Thousands of studies have shown that the kidnapper will do nothing
translation.fr: "Des milliers d'études le prouvent, "le ravisseur ne fera rien

translation.en: to jeopardize the receiving of the ransom."
translation.fr: "qui puisse compromettre la remise de la rançon."

translation.en: Chapter 9, section 3, written by Mr. Connor Miller.
translation.fr: Chapitre 9, troisième partie du manuel de M. Connor Miller.

translation.en: You read the book.
From cover to cover, sweetheart, and it sucked.
translation.fr: De A à Z, trésor. Il est naze.

translation.en: You gotta try this. It's so good.
You just scared the crap out of me.
translation.fr: Tu m'as fichu la trouille de ma vie.

translation.en: [Audrey] What was that?
What?
Very impressive.
How did you get out of that SUV before it blew up?
translation.fr: Comment vous êtes sorti du SUV avant l'explosion ?

translation.en: I didn't.
I climbed into a bomb-proof titanium chamber in the back seat.
translation.fr: Il y avait une cabine en titane à l'arrière.

translation.en: A public death. What better way to eliminate himself as a suspect.
translation.fr: Une mort en public. Idéal pour ne pas être soupçonné.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. But everything didn't go according to your plan, did it?
translation.fr: Mais tout ne s'est pas passé comme prévu.

translation.en: [Audrey] Your guy had his hand on the case seconds before a clean getaway.
translation.fr: Votre complice avait la mallette, il allait pouvoir s'échapper.

translation.en: [Nick] And boom.
The greedy ex enters the chat.
Hmm. $70 million. That's a lot of money,
translation.fr: 70 millions de dollars, c'est beaucoup d'argent, même pour une comtesse.

translation.en: even for a countess.
translation.fr: c'est beaucoup d'argent, même pour une comtesse.

translation.en: So she sends Imani over to hijack the hijackers.
translation.fr: Donc elle envoie Imani ravir la rançon aux ravisseurs.

translation.en: -Who? -[both] Imani.
-[Colonel] Who? -Iman-- The sidekick to the--
The Countess's… You know, do the laugh.
translation.fr: De la comtesse. Fais son rire.

translation.en: Do I have to? -Just knock it out. -[imitates Imani]
Now they know.
And then she swoops in,
steals the ransom money right out from under your nose.
translation.fr: et vous vole l'argent de la rançon sous le nez.

translation.en: -That must have hurt. -Uh-huh.
Now, if you had, in fact, read my book properly,
translation.fr: Si vous aviez lu mon livre avec attention,

translation.en: you'd remember that revealing the identity of a heretofore anonymous criminal
translation.fr: vous sauriez que révéler l'identité d'un criminel jusque-là anonyme met la vie de quiconque détient cette information en danger.

translation.en: puts all those privy to that information at risk.
translation.fr: met la vie de quiconque détient cette information en danger.

translation.en: Which means
I'm gonna have to kill you all.
translation.fr: que je dois tous vous tuer.

translation.en: Gary?
Who the hell are you?
I'm Susan.
-Do you know who this is? -I have no idea.
Gary and I met here ten years ago when I was studying abroad,
translation.fr: J'ai rencontré Gary ici il y a dix ans quand j'étudiais à l'étranger.

translation.en: and we promised that if we still loved each other
translation.fr: On s'est promis que si on s'aimait encore

translation.en: and we hadn't found anyone else,
that we would meet halfway up the Eiffel Tower at midnight tonight.
translation.fr: on se retrouverait au deuxième étage de la tour Eiffel à minuit, ce soir.

translation.en: And I still love him very much.
Are any of you Gary?
Put your hand down, Francisco.
-[Audrey] Oh my God! -[all yelling]
Oh God!
Get ready.
It just remains for me to say,
translation.fr: Je n'ai plus qu'à vous dire

translation.en: it's been a pleasure.
He still has the button blaster thingy!
translation.fr: Il a le bouton qui fait tout sauter !

translation.en: No! This is not what I planned!
translation.fr: C'est pas ce que j'avais prévu !

translation.en: There really is no end to your bad decision-making, is there?
translation.fr: Vous ne prenez que de mauvaises décisions, alors ?

translation.en: Nick! I can't believe I'm doing this.
translation.fr: Nick ! J'arrive pas à croire que je fais ça.
